creator: IGC Mobile s.r.o.
descriptionHtml:
Hearts: Play popular trick-based card game!

Also Hearts known as Black Lady, Chase the Lady, Crubs, Black Maria. Enjoy perfect graphics and gameplay, try to beat off other players!

In 2.x Hearts version, your 3 opponents are clever anthropoids cloistered in your Android device :)

Featuring:
- Jack of Diamonds, Cards passing rules and lot of other options
- 3 different cardsets (decks) to choose from
- Custom or default players names and avatars
- User statistics
- Smart computer opponents
- Frequent updates

title: Hearts Deluxe - Free Card Game

container.value:
IGC Mobile s.r.o
Lyckovo namesti 508/7
186 00 Praha 8 - Karlin
Česká republika

creator: IGC Mobile s.r.o.
descriptionHtml:
Black Lady is an American version of a Hearts card game for three to six players. It emerged in the early 20th century and is named after its highest penalty card, the Queen of Spades or Black Lady. Hearts is a group of card games with a variety of rules known in different countries as American Hearts, Black Lady Hearts, Black Widow and Rickety Kate in Australia.

This version supports the most popular American variation of the Hearts game for four players, the Omnibus variation and variations of Moons.

Play whenever and wherever!

Hearts is available for smartphones and tablets. Because the game plays with computer opponents (AI), you can start quickly and pause when necessary. Hearts Deluxe doesn't require an Internet connection, the main functions work offline too.

Hearts for Android from IGC Mobile:
- Beautiful modern game interface in landscape mode.
- Large, bright, clear cards.
- Three card decks with different designs.
- Variations of the rules in the game: “Shoot the Moon” and “Omnibus”.
- Customizable background, avatars, and players' names.
- Support for both phones and tablets.

Hearts is a free card game. We do not disturb our players with advertising on the playing field, only occasional ads may appear between rounds. These can be disabled by purchasing the premium version of the game in our store.

Let's start the game!

Each game of Hearts consists of several deals or hands, in which players play 13 tricks (according to the number of cards dealt for each player). Players will be penalized with one point for each heart card taken, and 13 points for the Queen of Spades.

The Omnibus option adds another significant bonus card - the Jack of Diamonds, which costs -10 points (it reduces the penalty score).

"Shoot the Moon" is an alternate way to win a round of Hearts. If the player takes all the hearts cards, the Queen of Spades, and the Jack of Diamonds (with the “Omnibus” option activated) then the player will achieve this type of victory.

The game continues until one of the players scores 100 points. Two other versions of the game are also available: a short game with a limit of 50 points and a long game that is up to 150 points. The player with the lowest score wins.

Help

If you have any questions or problems, please contact our support team.
We hope you enjoy our game!

creator: IGC Mobile s.r.o.
descriptionHtml:
Black Lady is an American version of a Hearts card game for three to six players. It emerged in the early 20th century and is named after its highest penalty card, the Queen of Spades or Black Lady. Hearts is a group of card games with a variety of rules known in different countries as American Hearts, Black Lady Hearts, Black Widow and Rickety Kate in Australia.

This version supports the most popular American variation of the Hearts game for four players, the Omnibus variation and variations of Moons.

Play whenever and wherever!

Hearts is available for smartphones and tablets. Because the game plays with computer opponents (AI), you can start quickly and pause when necessary. Hearts Deluxe doesn't require an Internet connection, the main functions work offline too.

Hearts for Android from IGC Mobile:
- Beautiful modern game interface in landscape mode.
- Large, bright, clear cards.
- Three card decks with different designs.
- Variations of the rules in the game: “Shoot the Moon” and “Omnibus”.
- Customizable background, avatars, and players' names.
- Support for both phones and tablets.

Hearts is a free card game. We do not disturb our players with advertising on the playing field, only occasional ads may appear between rounds. These can be disabled by purchasing the premium version of the game in our store.

Let's start the game!

Each game of Hearts consists of several deals or hands, in which players play 13 tricks (according to the number of cards dealt for each player). Players will be penalized with one point for each heart card taken, and 13 points for the Queen of Spades.

The Omnibus option adds another significant bonus card - the Jack of Diamonds, which costs -10 points (it reduces the penalty score).

"Shoot the Moon" is an alternate way to win a round of Hearts. If the player takes all the hearts cards, the Queen of Spades, and the Jack of Diamonds (with the “Omnibus” option activated) then the player will achieve this type of victory.

The game continues until one of the players scores 100 points. Two other versions of the game are also available: a short game with a limit of 50 points and a long game that is up to 150 points. The player with the lowest score wins.

Help

If you have any questions or problems, please contact our support team.
We hope you enjoy our game!
descriptionShort: Hearts Card Game - Avoid taking tricks with heart suit and Queen of Spades!

creator: IGC Mobile s.r.o.
descriptionHtml:
“Hearts” Card Game - Play Anywhere, Anytime!

Discover the classic Hearts card game, playable by three to six players. It emerged in the early 20th century and is named after its highest penalty card, the Queen of Spades or Black Lady.

IGC Mobile Hearts Deluxe version supports the most popular American variation of the Hearts game for four players, the Omnibus variation, and variations of Moons.

Don’t worry if you’re new to this game - this free sequence game will teach you how to play with our intuitive AI. Our artificial intelligence adapts to your Hearts card gameplay style, ensuring a fair and engaging experience.

Play whenever and wherever!

Key features of “Hearts” by IGC Mobile:

- Enjoy a beautiful modern game interface in landscape mode.
- Clear and Bright Cards: Large, bright, and easy-to-read cards.
- Multiple Card Decks: Three card designs to choose from.
- Customization: Personalize backgrounds, avatars, and player names.
- Device Compatibility: Optimized for both phones and tablets.
- Rule Variations: Includes “Shoot the Moon” and “Omnibus” variations.

Free to Play:

Hearts is a free card game. We do not disturb our players with advertising on the playing field; only occasional ads may appear between rounds. Upgrade to the premium version to remove all ads.

Let's dive into the game!

How to Play:

In each round of Hearts, players participate in several deals or hands, with each player receiving 13 cards. Heart cards carry a penalty of one point each, while the Queen of Spades incurs a hefty 13 points.

The Omnibus option adds another significant bonus card - the Jack of Diamonds, which reduces the penalty score by 10 points.

Achieving a dramatic feat called “Shooting the Moon” involves collecting all available points, including the Queen of Spades.

Scoring:

The game continues until a player reaches 100 points. Two other game versions are available: a shorter game with a 50-point limit and a longer one that extends up to 150 points.
The player with the lowest score emerges as the winner.

Need Help?

For any questions or issues, contact our support team at support@softick.com. Enjoy the game!

Let's start playing Hearts Deluxe!
